alert.note: Alert for Big Island Interior; Big Island North; Kahoolawe; Kohala; Maui Windward West (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued July 10 at 4:05PM HST until July 11 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY FOR PORTIONS OF MAUI KAHOOLAWE AND THE BIG ISLAND... .Locally windy conditions will continue across portions of Maui County and the Big Island tonight. ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST MONDAY... * WHAT...East winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts over 45 mph. The strongest winds will be over exposed ridges and through gaps. * WHERE...Kahoolawe, the west Maui Mountains and the Big Island saddle and over the Kohala mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and awnings and make it difficult to steer, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.

area.areaDesc: Big Island Interior; Big Island North; Kahoolawe; Kohala; Maui Windward West
